^rcfha n,hmsg m%isoaO lrk ,§'&
II fldgi – wêlrK
 msgqj  
iïu; jQ mk;a ... ... ... ... —
mk;a flgqïm;a ... ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha oekaùï ... ... ... ... —
Y%S ,xld weme,a Widúfha oekaùï ... ... ... —
fY%aIaGdêlrKfha wmrdO kvq ieis ms<sn| ksfõok ... —
Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK oekaùï ... 294
^fjk fjku f.dkq lr .; yels mßÈ iEu fldgilg u wh;a tla tla NdIdjlg fjk fjk msgq wxl fhdod we;'&
293- B 082216 — 353 (2021/03)
D 1 -
  msgqj 
jia;= Nx.;aj kvq ms<sn| oekaùï ... ... ... —
msial,a ud¾I,ajrekaf.a m;a lsÍï ... ... ... —
msial,a úlsKSu ... ... ...  310
nQo,a kvq ms<sn| oekaùï ... ... ... ... —
kS;s wOHdmk iNdfõ oekaùï ... ... ... —
fkd;dßia ,ehsia;= ... ... ... ... —
úúO oekaùï ... ... ... ... —
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h 
 fuu .eiÜ m;%h www.documents.gov.lk fjí wvúfhka nd.; l< yel' 
i;sm;d ksl=;a jk .eiÜ m;%fhys m<lsÍu i|yd Ndr.kq ,nk oekaùï ms<sn|
jeo.;a ksfõokhhs 
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha wjika msgqfõ iEu udihl u uq,a i;sfha § m<lrk ksfõok Ndr.kakd Èkhka iy fõ,djka 
ms<sn|j ñka wjOdkh fhduq lrkq ,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lsÍu i|yd oekaùï Ndr.ekSu .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkhg i;s follg fmr isl=rdod Èkfhys oyj,a 12'00 g wjika 
lrkq ,efí' ;k;=re - wenE¾;=" úNd." fgkav¾ iy fjkafoais ms<sn| oekaùïj, wjika Èk iy fõ,djka ta ms<sn|j Wkkaÿjla olajk whg m%udKj;a 
ld,fõ,djla ,efnk mßÈ fhdod.; hq;= njg" ish¨ u fomd¾;fïka;=" ixia:d iy uKav, hkdÈh j.n,d.; hq;= nj ñka wjOdrKh flf¾' m<lsÍu 
i|yd tjkq ,nk iEu oekaùula u ;ks me;af;a muKla meyeÈ,sj msgm;a l< hq;= h' ksrjoH;djh ms<sn|j lrk úuiSï iy meñKs,s 
.eiÜ m;%h m< 
jQ Èk isg f;uilg miqj Ndr.kq fkd,efí'
.eiÜ m;%fha m<lrk iEu oekaùula u .eiÜ m;%h m<lrkq ,nk Èkg i;s follg fmr ^tkï" 2021 wfm%a,a ui 16 jeks Èk m<lrk 
.eiÜ m;%fha oekaùï 2021 wfm%a,a ui 01 jeks Èk oyj,a 12'00g fyda Bg fmr& ;emEf,ka fyda f.kú;a rcfha uqøKd,hg NdrÈh hq;= h'
    2006 wxl 19 ork bf,lafg%dksl .Kqfokq mk; - 9 jeks j.ka;sh
   zzhï m%ldYkhla" Í;shla" ksfhda.hla" kshuhla" w;=re jHjia:djla" ksfõokhla fyda fjk;a lsisjla .eiÜ m;%fha m<l< hq;= njg 
hï mk;lska fyda kS;s m%{ma;shlska úêúOdk i,iajd we;s wjia:djl" ta Í;sh" ksfhda.h" kshuh" w;=re jHjia:dj" ksfõokh fyda fjk;a foh 
bf,lafg%dksl iajrEmfha jk .eiÜ m;%hl m< lrkq ,enqjfyd;a ta úêúOdkh iïmQ¾K lr we;a;dla fia ie<lsh hq;= h'˜
 .x.dks ,shkf.a"
 rcfha uqøKd,hdêm;s'
2021 ckjdß ui 01 jeks Èk"
fld<U 08"

ie' hq'- (i) fi;ai| fhda.d ksfla;kfha ld¾hNdrh ^ixia:d.; lsÍfï& mk;a flgqïm; 2021 ud¾;= ui 12 jeks Èk Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;s%l 
iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha II jeks fldgfia w;sf¾lhla jYfhka m< lrk ,§' 
 (ii) Pkao ysñhka ,shdmÈxÑ lsÍfï ^ixfYdaOk& mk;a flgqïm; 2021 ud¾;= ui 12 jeks Èk  Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;s%sl iudcjd§  
ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%fha  II jeks fldgfia w;sf¾lhla jYfhka m<lrk ,§'

II fldgi - Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h  - 2021'03'26
294  
Èid wêlrK yd ufyia;%d;a wêlrK oekaùï
ufyia;%d;a wêlrKh - l,auqfKa
ld,h bl=;a jQ kvq jd¾;d úkdY lsÍu
fuu wêlrKfha mjrk ,ÿj wjika lrk ,o j¾I oyhlg ^10& jvd mer‚ fï iuÕ wuqKd we;s f,aLkj, i|yka kvq 
jd¾;d 2021'07'04 jeks Èk fuu wêlrK N+ñfha § mq¿iaid úkdY lsÍug iQÞkï lr we;'
   fuu kvq iïnkaOj hï md¾Yjlrefjl=g ;udg wjYH kvqjl iïmQ¾K msgm;a fyda hï fldgila ,nd .ekSug 
wjYH kï" tA i|yd b,a¨ïm;% 2021'06'23 jeks Èkg fmr fuu wêlrK frðiag%d¾ fj; bÈßm;a l< hq;=h'
   tfia b,a,Sula fkdjqkfyd;a wuqKd we;s f,aLKj, i|yka kvq jd¾;d 2021'07'04 jeks Èk fuu wêlrK N+ñfha § 
mq¿iaid úkdY lrk nj fuhska okajkq ,efí'

ví' fÊ' o is,ajd uy;d úiska uek idok ,o 1998'01'17 Èk iy wxl 5695 ork msUqr m%ldrj fnod fjka lrk ,o" W;=rg 
( mdfrka o" kef.kysrg ( mdfrka o" ol=Kg ( î' whs' tia' m%kdkaÿ ysñlï lshk bvfuka o" niakdysrg ( à' î' tï' mSßia

la úYd, bvï fldgi iy tys ;=< msysá f.dvke.s,s" .yfld< wd§ ish¨ foa;a iu. fõ'
   fuu bvu ó.uqj bvï ,shdmÈxÑ lsÍfï ld¾hd,fha î 199$232 YS¾Ih hgf;a ,shdmÈxÑ lr we;'
   foam, msysàu '- cdwe, k.rfha isg ó.uqj mdf¾ lsf,daóg¾ 2 la muK .uka l,úg yuqjk ovq.u md,u miqjkjd;a 
iu.u ol=Kg jeà we;s Woïñg mdf¾ lsf,daóg¾ 1$4 la muK .uka lrkjd;a iu.u yuqjk ÿïßh yria mdr miqjk úg 
jug jeà we;s oUÿrh mdf¾  lsf,daóg¾ 1$2 la muK bÈßfhka we;s oUÿrh ngysr mdf¾ w,j;=msáh" ÿïßh ia:dkh yd

jug yer ;j;a ñg¾ 100 la muK .uka l,úg we;s v,aäka is,ajd udjf;a óg¾ 50 la muK bÈßfhka miq miska fuu 
foam, msysgd we;'

   bvug msúiSu '- nq;a;, isg fy<.u ud¾.fha Tlalïmsáh foig lsf,daóg¾ 06la muK ÿr hk úg fougu,a úydrh 
wi, fj,ahdhg uola nq;a;, foig jkakg mdf¾ jï miska mdrg udhsïj bvu msysgd we;'

75] tÈk isg Èk 30la we;=<; f.úh hq;=h'

úuikak'
ÿrl:k wxl ( 055-2276347
Wmf,aLkh
W!j m<df;a" fudKrd., Èia;%slalfha" nq;a;, jeÈ rg fldar<fha" nq;a;, m%dfoaYSh f,alï fldÜGdifha" Tlalïmsáh .%du 
ks,Odß fldÜGdifha" Tlalïmsáh kue;s .fï msysá zmkq,kafoahdhZ keue;s bvfï niakdysr me;af;a fjka l< fldgi 
hk bvfuka fldgilg wjir,;a udkl" je,suv mÈxÑ iqo;a; r;akdhl uy;d úiska j¾I 2015'03'09 jeks Èk uek idok 
,o wxl 1308 ork ie,eiau m%ldr tys len,s wxl 01 jYfhka ksrEms;" by; lS bvfuka fnod fjkalr .;a fldgila jk" 
m%udKfhka wlalr tlhs" m¾pia úis y;rhs oYu yhla ^w' 01" rEâ' 0" m¾' 24'6& la fyj;a fylaghd¾ 0'4669la úYd,;ajhg 
tlS ie,eiau m%ldr udhsï"
W;=rg  (  mdr ^m%dfoaYSh iNd& iy wä mdr o"
kef.kysrg  (  we< iy Þf.dfí we< o" ^ie,eiafï Þ.en f,i igyka lr we;& o"
ol=Kg  (  Þf.dn we< iy udkl iqo;a; r;akdhl uy;df.a wxl 1290 ork ie,eiafï len,s wxl 01
